sentences: Ta on otsustanud lahkuda oma kodu linna.
Meie meeskond on juba otsustanud uue treeneri valimise üle.
Ma tundsin, et ma olen väga kindel ja otsustanud selle tegevuse alustamiseks.
context: 'Otsustanud' means that someone has made a decision about something and is committed to it. It can be used to describe personal decisions, group choices or conclusions reached after consideration.
